goal.tools.unittest

Class Test

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.tools.unittest.Test

  • public class Test
extends java.lang.Object
    A test program. A test program consists of a list of TestSections. These rules are interpreted in sequential order. The rules are fast failing, meaning that the program will stop at the first rule that fails. The results are provided in a TestResult.
    Author:
    mpkorstanje

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      A test without rules.
